topic.title: Highlight Component Occurrences in WSDL Documents

body.p: When you position your mouse cursor over a component in a WSDL document, searches for the component declaration and all its references and highlights them automatically.
Customizable colors are used: one for the component definition and another one for component references. Occurrences are displayed until another component is selected.

To change the default behavior of Highlight Component Occurrences, and go to Editor Mark Occurrences . You can also trigger a search using the Search Search Occurrences in File () action from contextual menu. Matches are displayed in separate tabs of the Results view.
